languages.text: На корабле нет признаков жизни. Системы жизнеобеспечения давно вышли из строя — холод, мрак и тишина заполняют остов "Перста скорби".
The ship is devoid of vital signs. Life support systems have long since failed. Cold, darkness, and silence fill the wreck of the Finger of Sorrow.
languages.original_text: На корабле нет признаков жизни. Системы жизнеобеспечения давно вышли из строя — холод, мрак и тишина заполняют остов "Перста скорби".

traits.locale_text: The ship is devoid of vital signs. Life support systems have long since failed. Cold, darkness and silence fill the wreck of the "Finger of Sorrow".
The ship is devoid of vital signs. Life support systems have long since failed. Cold, darkness and silence fill the wreck of the "Finger of Sorrow".

The ship is devoid of vital signs. Life support systems have long since failed. Cold, darkness, and silence fill the wreck of the Finger of Sorrow.

languages.text: La nave carece de señales de vida. Los sistemas de soporte vital fallaron hace mucho. El frío, la oscuridad y el silencio llenan los restos del Dedo del Pesar.
languages.original_text: The ship is devoid of vital signs. Life support systems have long since failed. Cold, darkness, and silence fill the wreck of the Finger of Sorrow.

traits.locale_text: La nave carece de señales de vida. Los sistemas de soporte vital fallaron hace mucho. El frío, la oscuridad y el silencio llenan los restos del Dedo del Pesar.

languages.text: 船には生命反応がない。生命維持装置はとっくに故障しているようだ。寒さと暗さ、そして寂しさが、「悲しみの指」の残骸を満たしている。
languages.original_text: The ship is devoid of vital signs. Life support systems have long since failed. Cold, darkness, and silence fill the wreck of the Finger of Sorrow.

traits.locale_text: 船には生命反応がない。生命維持装置はとっくに故障しているようだ。寒さと暗さ、そして寂しさが、「悲しみの指」の残骸を満たしている。

languages.text: 这艘船上没有任何生命迹象，它的生命维持系统早就失效了。寒冷、黑暗与寂静填满了悲伤之指号的残骸。
languages.original_text: The ship is devoid of vital signs. Life support systems have long since failed. Cold, darkness, and silence fill the wreck of the Finger of Sorrow.

traits.locale_text: 这艘船上没有任何生命迹象，它的生命维持系统早就失效了。寒冷、黑暗与寂静填满了悲伤之指号的残骸。

languages.text: Das Schiff weist keine Lebenszeichen auf. Die Lebenserhaltungssysteme sind längst ausgefallen. Kälte, Dunkelheit und Stille erfüllen das Wrack der Finger des Leids.
languages.original_text: The ship is devoid of vital signs. Life support systems have long since failed. Cold, darkness, and silence fill the wreck of the Finger of Sorrow.

traits.locale_text: Das Schiff weist keine Lebenszeichen auf. Die Lebenserhaltungssysteme sind längst ausgefallen. Kälte, Dunkelheit und Stille erfüllen das Wrack der Finger des Leids.

languages.text: Le vaisseau ne montre aucun signe de vie. Les systèmes de survie sont hors service depuis longtemps. L'épave de l'Index du Malheur est plongée dans le froid, les ténèbres et le silence.
languages.original_text: The ship is devoid of vital signs. Life support systems have long since failed. Cold, darkness, and silence fill the wreck of the Finger of Sorrow.

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau ne montre aucun signe de vie. Les systèmes de survie sont hors service depuis longtemps. L'épave de l'Index du Malheur est plongée dans le froid, les ténèbres et le silence.

languages.text: Gemi, hayat belirtisinden yoksun. Yaşam destek sistemleri, uzun zaman önce çalışmayı kesmiş. Keder Parmağı'nın enkazını soğuk, karanlık ve sükûnet doldurmuş.
languages.original_text: The ship is devoid of vital signs. Life support systems have long since failed. Cold, darkness, and silence fill the wreck of the Finger of Sorrow.
